config.title: Basic Configuration
config.runInBackground: Continue Running in Background After Window Close

message.disabled: Update source not set, auto update disabled
message.cannotStartCheck: Cannot start check, please confirm update source is configured.
message.noUpdateAvailable: No update available to install, please check and download first.

devices.title: USB Device Mapping
devices.description: Connect printers to your computer and click refresh to see detected devices. You can assign aliases to each device below.

onboarding.skipConfirm: Are you sure you want to skip the guide? You can reopen it later in settings.

welcome.title: Welcome to Local Print Agent
welcome.subtitle: We will guide you through basic configuration and testing to ensure smooth printing.
welcome.content:
The process takes about 2-3 minutes. Please follow the prompts:

  • Bind Shop ID
  • Select default printer and complete test
  • Enable remote monitoring heartbeat for headquarters to track agent status

Click "Next" when ready.

shop.title: Configure Shop ID
shop.subtitle: Bind manager_next company/shop ID for system identification.
shop.content:
Enter Shop ID in the "Basic Configuration" section above (usually corresponds to manager_next companyId).

  • Current Input: {value}
  • Click "Save Configuration" in the top right after entering.

defaultPrinter.title: Set Default Printer
defaultPrinter.subtitle: Select a default USB printer for your shop.
defaultPrinter.content:
In the "USB Device Mapping" list, check "Default" for the printer you want to use and fill in alias/role.

  • Tip: You can select roles like Kitchen / FrontDesk / Receipt.
  • Current Default Printer: {printer}

testPrint.title: Complete Test Print
testPrint.subtitle: Confirm the default printer can output paper normally.
testPrint.content:
Click the "Test Print" button in the device list (or "Test Default Printer" in the tray menu) to ensure the printer outputs paper normally.

  • It is recommended to use paper to observe if "Test Print Task" content is printed.
  • Current Status: {status}

telemetry.title: Enable Remote Monitoring
telemetry.subtitle: Let headquarters track shop agent status in real-time for quick support.
telemetry.content:
In "Remote Monitoring", check "Enable Heartbeat Reporting" and "Upload Log Tail", and confirm the endpoint URL is correct.

  • After completion, click "Send Now" to see if it shows "Online".
  • Current Status: {status}

dialogs.restartConfirm: Are you sure you want to restart the local print Agent? Current tasks will be interrupted.
dialogs.quitConfirm: Are you sure you want to completely quit the local print Agent? It will no longer receive print tasks after quitting.

noDefaultPrinter.title: No Default Printer Configured
noDefaultPrinter.message: Please check "Default" for a device in the application interface before testing.

testFailed.title: Test Failed
testFailed.message: Default printer not found. Please confirm USB device is connected.

testComplete.title: Test Complete
testComplete.message: Test print has been sent. Please check if the printer outputs paper.

unsupportedPrinter.title: Unsupported Printer Type
unsupportedPrinter.message: Current default printer type does not support tray testing. Please test in the application.

print.successMessage: Print success indicates local agent is working
